name: Config 2022 - Words as Design: systemizing product copy and building Ditto
description:
In this Config 2022 session, Jess and Jo share their journey of building Ditto on Figma through the larger context of the importance of text in design, ways in which designers and writers can collaborate more effectively, and strategies for teams to think about text as a system in their own products.
